channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report X-2023110077
item.description:
Report X-2023110077

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-23
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to QA area in a black bin with a plastic liner. Package was leaking white paint. DescribePack: Two 3.5-liter cans in the package were dented and were leaking from their tops. Closures on the paint cans were loose and falling off. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a bin with a plastic liner to contain the spillage.

item.title: Report X-2023101223
item.description:
Report X-2023101223

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-27T18:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-18
  • City: OAK CREEK
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED ON THE SOUTH INDUCT. AFTER IT WAS BROUGHT TO THE DMP, WAS DESCOVERED TO HAVE A DAMAGED AEROSOL CAN, AND NO LIMITED QUANTITY MARKINGS. THE OUTER PACKAGING WAS A USED BOX. THE RESPONDER THEN CALLED IT IN TO THE UPS HAZMAT LINE, CONFIRMED UNDECLARED.

item.title: Report X-2023110109
item.description:
Report X-2023110109

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-24
  • City: CUDAHY
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: box left for QA with some evidence of being partly crushed or dropped, leaking DescribePack: Inside, 1 of 4 half-gallon plastic bottles of paint stripper gel had closure bent enough to allow approximately 0.2 gallons to spill, soaking all contents and inside of box DurationRel: 10 and MitigateEffect: box placed in plastic tote under ventilator hood

item.title: Report X-2023101164
item.description:
Report X-2023101164

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: OAK CREEK
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND IN THE UNLOAD LEAKING. APON ARRIVAL AT THE DMP A RESPONDER NOTICED THE CONTENTS WERE MORE DANGEROUS THAN THE PACKAGING SHOWED. AFTER MORE INVESTIGATION, IT WAS FOUND TO BE A HAZMAT ACCORDING TO THE PRODUCTS SDS.

item.title: Report X-2023101218
item.description:
Report X-2023101218

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28

  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: LEAKED IN TRAILER. EMPLOYEE IDENTIFIED AS LEAKING IN UNLOAD. PACKAGE PROGRESS STOPPED RESPONDER NOTIFIED. RESPONDER PROCESSED LEAKING HAZMAT THROUGH DMP.
